pkgmetadata.longdescription: FidusWriter-Books=================FidusWriter-Books is a Fidus Writer plugin to allow for the composition of booksand article collections, using individual documents as chapters.Installation------------1) Install Fidus Writer like this: pip install fiduswriter[books]2) Add "book" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting in the configuration.py file like this:: INSTALLED_APPS += ( ... 'book', )3) Run ``fiduswriter setup`` to create the needed database tables and to create the needed JavaScript files.4) (Re)start your Fidus Writer server
